Assignment 4 class to render a weighted directed graph as a matrix and return path results.

getPath

public static java.lang.String getPath(int[][] adjacencyMatrix,
                                       int startNode,
                                       int endNode)
User facing method to check an already existing two-dimensional Array for valid paths through the weighted directional graph.

Parameters:
adjacencyMatrix - the 2D Array to be checked.
startNode - the starting point.
endNode - the ending point.
Returns:
the String representing the path through the Array.
